name: Waykar 2000 Sq. Ft Dehumidifier for Home and Basements, with Auto or Manual Drainage, 0.66 Gallon Water Tank Capacity
short_description: Dehumidifier for Space Up to 2000 Sq. Ft: Our dehumidifiers are able to remove up to 34 pints of moisture per day. (Please note: under 95°F, 90%RH condition,the max dehumidification capacity up to 34 pints) in areas up to 2000 Sq. Ft and adjust humidity from 30% to 80%.It is a dehumidifier ideal for any basements, office, home, bathroom, bedroom, kitchen, stockroom, living room, laundry room, cellars, crawlspace, etc..

Unique Design for The Modern Home: The Waykar dehumidifiers designed with modern look. With 360° rotatable wheels and ergonomically lift up handles, you can move around this dehumidifier easily. A quiet fan that won't disturb you when you sleep or at work, adjustable fan speeds for multiple choices. 24-hour Timer Setting for preset operation and reduced energy consumption

Intelligent Control: After you set your desired humidity, the dehumidifier will run intelligently. Humidity Auto Control-Simply adjust to your desire humidity, it will work smartly, when it reached its designated humidity, it will automatically stop working and then automatically restart to dehumidify when the humidity above target is sensed. Automatic Shut Off/On-Shuts off automatically when the bucket is full and switch it on again after the bucket emptied. Power Outage Automatic Restart

Easy To Use: Auto Drain - The unit comes with a 6.56 feet drain hose that you can attached to the drain pipe hole to continually drain water that is dehumidified. Manual Drain - The water tank is 0.66 gallon/2.5 L,when it reaches maximum capacity, the "Full Tank "indicator will light up, the dehumidifier will automatically switch off until the tank has been emptied. Meanwhile, a reusable and washable filter preserves fresh and clean air quality

Support: All of Waykar Dehumidifiers are covered with 30-Days Money Back if you are not satisfied with the product, 1 year guarantee, 2nd year guarantee extension and lifetime expert tech support. Please don't hesitate to contact us if there is any question, we will reply to you within 24 hours and help you solve the problems. Waykar customer support team is always just one-email away

name: Camco Dehumidifier Moisture Absorber - Absorbs Up to 3X Its Weight in Water, Reduces Moisture and Humidity in Offices, Closets, Bathrooms, Kitchens, Boats, RVs and More – Refillable (44280)
short_description: Removes moisture from the air and traps it, reducing humidity in confined areas
Lavender-scented fragrance beads leave the air smelling fresh
Absorbs up to 3x its weight in moisture
Easy and safe to empty
Refill container over and over
Fit Type: Universal Fit
product_description: The Camco Moisture Absorber is an easy way to reduce humidity in your basement, closet, bathroom, boat, RV or any confined area! The moisture-absorbing agent acts fast to trap humidity and lavender-scented fragrance beads keep the air smelling fresh. One container of media will absorb up to three times its weight in water, and when it’s done you can safely empty and refill it over and over again.

name: TCL 5,000 BTU Smart Portable Air Conditioner, Fan & Dehumidifier, 150 Sq. Ft., Ultra-Compact Design, Remote Control, Compatible with Alexa/Google Assistant, Install Kit Included
short_description: New Ultra Compact Design, Same Powerful Performance: Powerfully cools up to 150 sq. ft. with an ultra-compact footprint that is only 10.8inx10.6in, perfect for super tight spaces in any room like dorms, bedrooms, offices, and more
3-in-1 Comfort: Chill out, cool down, or dry off with TCL’s 3-in-1 AC, fan, and dehumidifier to suit a wide array of needs
App, Remote, or Voice Control: Cool your home with the friendly TCL Home App, simple voice commands using Alexa or Google Assistant-enabled devices, or the included remote
Energy Efficient: Save energy like a pro with Sleep and Eco modes to help you save money throughout the year
Convenient Controls: The LED display makes controlling your portable air conditioner simple, while the included remote lets you effortlessly control the unit without ever leaving the couch
product_description: Stay cool the smart way with the powerful cooling capacity of the TCL 5,000 BTU (8,500 BTU ASHRAE) smart portable air conditioner featuring AC, fan, and dehumidifier modes. The fan circulates air while the AC helps you easily adjust and manage temperatures in rooms up to 150 sq. ft. Additionally, the dehumidifier function helps to reduce moisture in your home. The user-friendly TCL Home App lets you control your unit from anywhere, change the temperature, set schedules, and more. You can use simple voice commands to control your portable AC when paired with Alexa or Google Assistant-enabled devices. The washable and reusable filter helps protect your portable AC's life while reducing large airborne particles like dust and pet hair. Setup is made easy with the included installation kit and guided in-app instructions that will have your unit up and running in minutes. The two handles and four wheels make this portable air conditioner easy to glide from room to room, keeping you cool in any room with a vertical or horizontal sliding window.

name: CLEVAST Small Dehumidifier for Home, 30 OZ Mini Quiet Dehumidifiers for Bedroom, Portable Compact Air Dehumidifier for Room, Bathroom, Closet, RV, Camper, House (Not Cordless)
short_description: ADVANCED DEHUMIDIFIER: The CLEVAST small dehumidifier for bedroom uses semiconductor condensation technology and operates without any chemical refrigerants. It efficiently eliminates excess moisture through physical methods, ensuring no pollution is created. In a closed small room with an environment of 86°F and 85%RH, it can gather up to 10 oz (295 ml) of water within a 24-hour period.(Coverage area: 285 sq. ft)

ENERGY-SAVING & 24dB ULTRA-QUIET: This home dehumidifier is energy-efficient, consuming less than 0.55 kWh per day. Operating at just 24 dB, it’s whisper-quiet, so you’ll hardly notice it’s on—allowing you to enjoy a restful night in a comfortably dry environment.

DEHUMIDIFIER FOR SMALL SPACE: This table top dehumidifier is small in size, measuring 4.5 x 6.5 x 9.2 inches, and features a 30 oz water tank. With a convenient handle on the back makes it easy to move wherever you need it. This dehumidifier is perfect for bedroom, bathroom, closet, rv, office, apartment, baby nursery, house, camper, attic, single room, indoor, kitchen, desk, rv trailer, pantry, cabinet, car, bookshelf.

AUTO SHUT-OFF: This mini bathroom dehumidifier will automatically stop operating when the water tank is full, preventing any overflow. The blue backlight on the power button changes to orange, reminding you to empty the tank. This feature lets you use it safely and conveniently, even when you're not home.

EASY TO USE: This closet dehumidifier requires no complex operations—simply press the power button, and the silent dehumidifier will begin its continuous moisture removal function. Note: Do not block the air intake at the back or the air outlet on the top of the desk dehumidifier, as this may affect its performance.

name: Eva-Dry Wireless Mini Dehumidifier, White (E-333)
short_description: ✔ EASY TO USE: This mini dehumidifier is spill and mess free. Just hang and go! Non-toxic, child and pet safe! Your small rooms will be dry and odor free. Works for areas up to 333 cubic feet.
✔ MINI DEHUMIDIFIER GOES A LONG WAY: Super dry dehumidifier unit lasts 20-30 days before recharging the silica gel beads. Absorbing capacity up to 6oz.

✔ SMALL, SLEEK DESIGN: This portable small design lets you hang or conveniently place the dehumidifier anywhere to fight pesky humidity! Cars, closets, boats, cabinets, gun safes, and even gym bags! A very convenient cool gift for everyone!

✔ 100% CORDLESS DEHUMIDIFIER: Moisture out: Cords out! No cables or batteries required. Just charge your device and say bye-bye humidity! Renewable and rechargeable moisture absorber. Lasts up to 4 weeks before recharge.

✔ SATISFACTION : SUPER DRY ODOR-FREE LIFE! Our dehumidifiers are top quality! Super durable and reliable. Comes with an industry-leading 5 year so you can get rid of moisture and not worry about mold or leaks!

✔ EVA-DRY DEHUMIDIFIERS EXPERTS: We have the dryness you need! Find the perfect dehumidifier for your specific need: Car dehumidifier, gun safe dehumidifier, even the dehumidifier bag! Dehumidifiers big or small, WE HAVE THEM!
product_description: EVA-DRY Mini Dehumidifier This mini yet powerful dehumidifier is optimal for all of your small spaces including closets, cabinets, cars, bathrooms and even gun safes! It’s also a must-have gift for boat and marine fanatics! Engineered with non-toxic crystallized silica gel technology, the EVA DRY mini Dehumidifier will quickly and efficiently absorb up to 4 to 6 oz of moisture from the air, without any leaks or spills. The device is 100% renewable! It requires no batteries or cords for use, and works for up to 10 years! As the device absorbs the humidity, our moisture indicator beads will turn from orange to green, indicating that its time to recharge the unit. With the new and improved EVA DRY mini dehumidifier, enjoy a dry, odorless and healthy environment in your house and small spaces! EVA-DRY THE DEHUMIDIFIER EXPERTS: We have the dryness you need! Find the perfect dehumidifier for your specific need: Car dehumidifier, gun safe dehumidifier, even the dehumidifier bag! Dehumidifiers big or small, WE HAVE THEM!

name: Rechargeable Small Dehumidifier, Portable Mini Dehumidifier for Bathroom, Highly Efficient Dehumidification, Energy Saving, Suitable for Closet, Cars, Wardrobes, Bookcases
short_description: Efficient Dehumidification, Creating A Dry Environment - ATKMAYI small dehumidifier has built-in silica particles, which can effectively trap excess humidity. Its efficient absorption system works continuously to balance indoor conditions. Suitable for small enclosed spaces up to 35 sq.ft such as closets and bathrooms. This car dehumidifier is perfect for protecting clothing, documents or medicines in high humidity environments

Rechargeable, Long-lasting - This rechargeable dehumidifier only needs to be charged for 24 hours (AC220V, 25W) and can work for 4 days. No need to keep the charging cable connected while dehumidifying, and no batteries are required! The energy-saving design is safer than electric dehumidifiers and runs quieter. Professional tips: Please place the machine upright when charging, otherwise it will affect the charging efficiency; slight heating or water droplets on the body are normal

Dehumidification Principle - The closet dehumidifier contains a large number of silica gel beads. Silica gel is a porous material with an extensive microporous structure, exhibiting strong water-absorbing properties. Its dehumidification process relies on physical adsorption, where hydroxyl groups (-OH) on the micropore surfaces bond with water molecules, effectively removing excess humidity from the air and maintaining optimal dryness

Portable Design, Space Saving - This desiccant dehumidifier measures only 6" x 4.8" x 1.5", and can be easily placed anywhere: bedside table, car trunk or narrow corner. Double-sided dehumidification holes can maximize air circulation, ensuring efficient dehumidification whether placed vertically or horizontally, and the detachable hook allows you to hang it anywhere you want. It can protect valuable items such as cameras, guitars or medicines without taking up space

Full Set Of Accessories, Worry-free Warranty - This mini dehumidifier for bathroom includes 1 small dehumidifier, 39.37'' power cord and high-quality color-changing silica gel crystals. Designed for worry-free humidity control, We provide 1-year manufacturer's warranty. If there are any problems with the product, we will do our best to solve it for you. This reusable dehumidifier is perfect for students, travelers and humidity-sensitive families, it is your best choice

name: Moisture Absorber, TABYIK Reusable dehumidifier Box, With 2 Moisture Absorber Bags, 34 OZ Each, for Bathroom, Closet, Kitchen and Bedroom
short_description: ECO-FRIENDLY DESIGN: The innovative design combines a reusable shell with a replaceable dehumidification bag. Compared with traditional disposable products, it is more environmentally friendly and promotes sustainability

ABSORBING MOISTURE & ODOR: The dehumidification bag contains calcium chloride and activated carbon, which have the functions of absorbing moisture and odors. It is very suitable for damp and odorous areas such as wardrobes, shoe cabinets, and cat litter areas.

LONG-LASTING FRESHNESS: The usable time varies depending on the temperature and humidity. The shell is equipped with a water level ruler for monitoring the water collected in the dehumidification chamber.
VERSATILE APPLICATlON: Requiring no power, it fits flexibly into spaces like wardrobe corners, bedside tables, and bathrooms, addressing localized dampness issues that traditional dehumidifiers miss.

EASY TO USE: Remove dehumidification bag,tear a dehumidification bag packaging place the open dehumidification bag on the bracket,place on any plane you want. Please empty the moisture in the dehumidifier box once a week.

name: 2500 Sq.Ft Dehumidifier for Basement with Drain Hose, 34 Pints Dehumidifiers for Home Large Room Bathroom Bedroom,3 Modes, Adjustable Humidity Control, Timer, Auto Defrost, Sleep Mode
short_description: 2500 Sq.Ft Coverage | 34 Pints/Day Capacity - Our Cagstul dehumidifier tackles moisture effortlessly in spaces up to 2500 sq ft, ideal for basements, garages, and large rooms. With 34 pints/day extraction (95°F/90%RH), it maintains optimal 30%-80% humidity levels using smart sensors. Protect your bedrooms, bathrooms, and storage spaces from excess moisture, and enjoy a fresh, breathable environment throughout your home!

Tailored Comfort with 3 Modes - Experience ultimate adaptability with our three innovative modes. In Auto Mode, effortlessly customize humidity levels between 30%-80% to match your preferences. Continuous Mode provides rapid drying for laundry, keeping your clothes fresh and ready. Meanwhile, Sleep Mode turns your space into a serene retreat, ensuring peaceful, restful nights. Whatever the weather outside, create the ideal indoor climate for every occasion!

Dual Drainage Options for Convenience - Experience flexibility with our innovative basement dehumidifier featuring dual drainage solutions. Start with the manual drainage option, equipped with a 0.53-gallon tank that automatically stops when full-no spills, no mess! For those long, humid days, effortlessly switch to the continuous drainage mode using the included hose, ensuring your space stays dry without the hassle of frequent emptying.

Effortless Smart Control - Seamlessly manage your dehumidifier with our intuitive smart control panel. With just a touch, you can effortlessly set your desired humidity, adjust the 24-hour timer, monitor moisture levels, and customize fan speed. Designed for user-friendliness, it’s perfect for everyone in the household. Let our home dehumidifier maintain your ideal environment effortlessly

Stylish and User-Friendly Design - The Cagstul dehumidifier seamlessly blends modern style with exceptional functionality. Its sleek design, paired with convenient wheels and a sturdy handle, makes moving it from room to room effortless. With reliable features like auto defrost, child lock, and full water protection, this unit is designed for ease of use. Maintenance is hassle-free, thanks to a removable tank, ensuring your home stays both elegant and fresh!

name: BREEZOME 60 OZ Dehumidifiers for Home, Dual-Semiconductor Quiet Dehumidifier with Timer Sleep Mode Auto-Off 7 Colors Light Portable Small Dehumidifiers for Bathroom, Cloakroom, RV
short_description: 2X SEMICONDUCTOR CONDENSERS: In order to improve the efficiency, BREEZOME dehumidifiers equipped with DUAL semiconductor condensers which almost double the effect of other small dehumidifiers. It effectively absorb up to 700ml excess moisture per day (Tested in 86°F, 80% RH which can achieve optimal performance). Our dehumidifier can cover various small spaces such as bathrooms, kitchens, cloakrooms, RV, etc.

1.8L(60 OZ) LARGE CAPACITY: The dehumidifiers for room is designed with a 1.8L(60oz) large water tank which allows it works for long time and don’t need to empty the water tank frequently. With the AUTO Shut-Off features, the dehumidifier will stop running automatically and flash red light to remind you to empty the water tank when it is full.

PORTABLE DEHUMIDIFIER: Our dehumidifier has a compact size, designed with a built-in handle for easy portability, allowing you to take it anywhere you want. In addition, BREEZOME dehumidifiers are equipped with defrost function. It can remove frost from the semiconductors to make sure it work.

QUIET SLEEP MODE & COLORFUL LIGHT: Our dehumidifiers for bedroom not only have a power mode but also a 35dB quiet sleep mode to meet your various needs. There's an adjustable night light that can change colors and create a comfortable atmosphere.

TIMER FUNCTION: With the power of 48W, it only consumes 1.15kwh of electricity after 24 hours of operation. The dehumidifier for bedroom is also designed with a 12-24-36-48 hours timer to make sure it only operates within a specific time range to prevent extra waste.

name: ToLife Dehumidifiers for Home 95 OZ Water Tank with Auto-Off 1000 sq.ft Sleep Mode Portable Dehumidifier for Basement Bathroom Home RV Closet Room 7 Colors LED Light,Grey
short_description: Powerful Moisture Removal: The ToLife bathroom dehumidifier uses advanced semiconductor condensation technology to quietly and effectively remove moisture from the air. It’s perfect for bedrooms, bathrooms, basements, kitchens, closets, and more

Smart Automatic Shutoff：Our dehumidifier for basement has an intelligent automatic shutoff feature that activates when the water tank is full or misaligned, preventing overflow and ensuring safety and convenience, even when you’re not at home

Dual Working Modes: Dehumidifiers for home choose between high-speed mode for quick humidity reduction and sleep mode for a peaceful night. The sleep mode operates at less than 30 dB, creating a serene environment that won’t disturb your sleep

Ambient Night Lights: Featuring 7 LED color options, our dehumidifier for bedroom adds a romantic touch to your space and can serve as a night light for a comforting sleep environment. Plus, the built-in handle allows for easy portability
